Address.Address1: Vara Blanca, Poas Volcano National Park

Description.Text: Poas Volcano Lodge is a stylish 3-star boutique hotel offering spacious accommodation in the heart of Poas Volcano National Park. Highlights include a large living room and free Wi-Fi. Poas Volcano National Park is a large area in central Costa Rica featuring an active volcano and lush flora. Nearby places of interest include the Cloud Forest Trails and La Paz Waterfall Garden. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a charming wooden lodge set amongst lush greenery. Facilities include a library and living room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Garden rooms are spacious and individually decorated in a bright elegant style with wood panelling, stone walls and soft lighting. Amenities include a safe and en-suite bathroom. The Bromelia restaurant offers European and regional dishes in a relaxed and friendly setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite.
